contestTemplates.title: Dormant Wallet Wealth Recovery Tracker
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that identifies dormant wallets with unclaimed airdrops, forgotten staking rewards, or stuck tokens across chains.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must scan Ethereum, BSC, Arbitrum, and Solana. Output CSV with wallet, asset, and estimated value.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Coverage of airdrop programs, accuracy of dormant detection, value estimation

contestTemplates.title: Nansen-Style Wallet Labeler
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that automatically labels wallets based on on-chain behavior patterns (whale, smart money, bot, exchange, etc).
contestTemplates.constraints: Must achieve 85%+ accuracy on known labeled wallets. Support EVM chains.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Label accuracy, behavioral pattern detection, false positive rate

contestTemplates.title: Forensic Fund Flow Visualizer
contestTemplates.objective: Build a tool that traces fund flows from hacked protocols and visualizes the path through mixers and bridges.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must handle Tornado Cash, Railgun, and cross-chain bridges. Output interactive graph.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Trace completeness, mixer de-anonymization rate, visualization clarity

contestTemplates.title: Pump.fun Sniper Detection System
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that detects insider/sniper wallets on Pump.fun launches before they dump.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must flag wallets within first 10 blocks of launch. Real-time alerts.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Early detection rate, false positive rate, alert latency

contestTemplates.title: DEX Arbitrage Path Finder
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that finds profitable multi-hop arbitrage paths across Uniswap, Sushi, Curve, and Balancer.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must account for gas costs and slippage. Profit threshold configurable.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Path discovery rate, profit accuracy after fees, execution speed

contestTemplates.title: Rug Pull Early Warning System
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that scores new tokens for rug pull probability based on contract code, deployer history, and liquidity patterns.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must analyze within 60 seconds of deployment. Support Solana and EVM.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Prediction accuracy over 30-day period, speed, coverage

contestTemplates.title: Telegram Alpha Group Scraper
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that monitors private Telegram alpha groups and extracts actionable token calls with sentiment analysis.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must handle invite-only groups. Dedupe cross-posted calls. Rate confidence.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Extraction accuracy, sentiment scoring, latency from post to alert

contestTemplates.title: Mempool Sandwich Attack Detector
contestTemplates.objective: Create a real-time agent that detects sandwich attacks in the mempool and alerts victims before confirmation.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must monitor Ethereum and Arbitrum mempools. Sub-second detection.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Detection rate, false positives, alert speed

contestTemplates.title: KOL Wallet Tracker Dashboard
contestTemplates.objective: Build a dashboard that tracks wallets of known crypto influencers and alerts on their trades.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must include at least 50 verified KOL wallets. Real-time updates.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Wallet coverage, update latency, UI/UX

contestTemplates.title: Airdrop Eligibility Checker
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that checks wallet eligibility for upcoming and unannounced airdrops based on protocol interaction patterns.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must track at least 20 potential airdrop protocols. Weekly updates.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Protocol coverage, prediction accuracy, false positive rate

contestTemplates.title: Smart Contract Honeypot Scanner
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that detects honeypot tokens by simulating buy/sell transactions before users trade.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must detect hidden fees, transfer blocks, and owner-only sells. Sub-second response.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Detection accuracy, simulation reliability, speed

contestTemplates.title: CEX Withdrawal Pattern Analyzer
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that monitors exchange hot wallet outflows and predicts large price movements.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must track Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, and OKX wallets.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Prediction accuracy, lead time before price move, false signal rate

contestTemplates.title: Liquidation Cascade Predictor
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that predicts DeFi liquidation cascades by monitoring health factors across Aave, Compound, and Maker.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must provide 30-minute advance warning. Track top 1000 positions.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Prediction accuracy, lead time, position coverage

contestTemplates.title: Bridge Exploit Monitor
contestTemplates.objective: Create a real-time agent that monitors cross-chain bridges for anomalous transactions indicating potential exploits.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must cover Wormhole, LayerZero, Stargate, and Across. Instant alerts.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Anomaly detection rate, false positives, alert speed

contestTemplates.title: Solana Program Upgrade Watcher
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that monitors Solana programs for upgrade authority changes and suspicious code modifications.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must track top 100 Solana DeFi programs. Diff code changes.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Coverage, detection speed, diff accuracy

contestTemplates.title: Twitter CT Sentiment Aggregator
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that aggregates Crypto Twitter sentiment for specific tokens with influencer weighting.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must process 10K+ tweets/hour. Weight by follower count and historical accuracy.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Sentiment accuracy, processing speed, influencer database size

contestTemplates.title: Gas War Optimizer
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that optimizes gas bidding strategies for NFT mints and token launches.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must predict optimal gas within 5% of winning bids. Support priority fees.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Bid accuracy, success rate, cost efficiency

contestTemplates.title: DAO Treasury Analyzer
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that tracks DAO treasuries and summarizes spending proposals with risk assessment.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must cover top 50 DAOs by AUM. Generate weekly reports.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Treasury coverage, summary quality, risk scoring accuracy

contestTemplates.title: Whale Alert Copytrader
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that automatically mirrors trades from successful whale wallets with configurable parameters.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must support position sizing, stop losses, and wallet blacklisting.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Execution speed, P&L vs tracked wallets, slippage management

contestTemplates.title: Private Sale Unlock Tracker
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that tracks token vesting schedules and alerts before large VC/team unlocks.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must cover tokens with >$10M MC. 7-day advance warning.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Unlock coverage, timing accuracy, data completeness

contestTemplates.title: MEV Bundle Simulator
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that simulates MEV bundle profitability before submission to Flashbots.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must account for competing bundles and state changes. 95%+ accuracy.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Simulation accuracy, speed, competing bundle modeling

contestTemplates.title: Stablecoin Depeg Early Warning
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that monitors stablecoin reserves and market conditions to predict depeg events.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must track USDT, USDC, DAI, FRAX, and algorithmic stables.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Prediction lead time, false positive rate, reserve monitoring depth

contestTemplates.title: NFT Wash Trading Detector
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that identifies wash trading on NFT marketplaces to filter fake volume.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must analyze OpenSea, Blur, and Magic Eden. Flag suspicious patterns.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Detection accuracy, coverage, real-time processing

contestTemplates.title: L2 Sequencer Downtime Monitor
contestTemplates.objective: Create an agent that monitors L2 sequencer health and alerts on potential downtime or censorship.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must cover Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, and zkSync. Track block times.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Monitoring coverage, alert speed, false positive rate

contestTemplates.title: Retroactive Airdrop Farmer
contestTemplates.objective: Build an agent that automates interactions with protocols likely to do retroactive airdrops.
contestTemplates.constraints: Must rotate wallets, manage gas, and track interaction history.
contestTemplates.evaluation_criteria: Protocol coverage, interaction diversity, cost efficiency
